summary: A movie producer who made a huge flop tries to salvage his career by revamping his film as an erotic production, where its family-friendly star takes her top off.
cast: Julie Andrews|William Holden|Marisa Berenson|Larry Hagman|Robert Loggia|Stuart Margolin|Richard Mulligan|Robert Preston|Craig Stevens|Loretta Swit|Robert Vaughn|Robert Webber|Shelley Winters|Jennifer Edwards|Rosanna Arquette|John Pleshette|John Lawlor|Ken Swofford|Hamilton Camp|Paul Stewart|Mimi Davis|Benson Fong|Bert Rosario|Larry Storch|David Young|Byron Kane|Virginia Gregg|Herb Tanney|Troubles|Joe Penny|Erica Yohn|Colleen Brennan|Gene Nelson|Paddy Stone|Charles Lampkin|Stephen Johnson|Kevin Justrich|Pat Colbert|Kimberly Woodward|Scott Arthur Allen|Corbin Bernsen|Joseph Benti|Rebecca Edwards|Neil Flanagan|Todd Mason|Jill Jaress|Alexandra Johnson|Len Lawson|Shelby Leverington|Gisele Lindley|Dominick Mazzie|Bill McLaughlin|Tony Miller|Dave Morick|Charles Parks|Charles Rowe|James Purcell|Gay Rowan|Borah Silver|Ken Smolka|Henry Sutton|Noel Toy|Howard Vann|Sherri Zak|Karen Austin|Robert Ayers|Robert Buckingham|Paul DeCeglie|Peter Paul Eastman|Todd Everett|Michael Flaherty|Ron Gans|Ken Grant|Nadejda Klein|Fay McKenzie|Stan Rodarte|Linda Ryan
title: S.O.B. Sois Honrados Bandidos
